text: Zhenzhu yindao shei, shei jiushi zunxun zhengdao de; zhenzhu shi shei mi wu, ni buneng wei shei faxian zhenzhu yiwai de baohu zhe. Zai fuhuo ri, wo jiang shi tamen you xia you ya you long de pufuzhe jihe qilai, tamen de guisu shi huo yu. Mei dang huoshi jianruo de shihou, wo zengjia tamen de huoyan
